name: Fly Me to the Moon (SpyderByteStudios)
description:
You are Me.

No, not me. Me!

You are a fruit fly and your name is Me!


Me, like all other fruit flies, is only on this Earth for one day, but unlike all other fruit flies, Me dreams of more than just rolling balls of poo and eating rotten bananas. Me dreams of being the first fruit fly to visit the moon.

...but can Me make it?


Begin the climb out of Poo Paradise and up to the stars! Etch your name in fruit fly history forever.

Your purpose is clear...


Fly Me to the Moon!




Controls

MoveArrow Keys JumpX HoverX (in the air)


While ascending through the four unique levels of Poo Paradise, you will come across all kinds of quirky characters. Let's meet them!


Fly Guy

Fly Guys are fly... and flies... and guys! They're much too cool to pay you any mind. They like to just fly around and be fly.


Jerry Flyce

Jerry Flyce loves football and aspires someday to play for the Congerville Flyers. He'll tackle anything that catches his eye, so watch out!



Pretty Fly

The fancy of all the man-flies, Pretty Flies love ballet and practising their Entrechat. They like to show off by jumping extra high when other flies are watching.


Semaphly

Semaphlies are quite timid and will call for back-up if anything startles them. Stay out of their sights if you want to avoid the Spitflier brigade!



Spitflier

Spitfliers zip along the sky and rain down bombs on your head. Take cover when you hear them coming!



F.L.Ylien

F.L.Yliens are a highly intelligent race of super flies! Don't get too close or they'll zap you with their weird alien rayguns!




I'd just like to thank everyone who took the time to visit this page and play Fly Me to the Moon. It means a lot to me!

Fly Me to the Moon was made in 10 days for Retrograde Jam #2.
